      • openUrlConnection

        public static java.net.URLConnection openUrlConnection(java.net.URL url,
                                                       java.lang.String userAgent,
                                                       java.lang.String referrer,
                                                       int timeout,
                                                       boolean followRedirects)
                                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                                       java.net.SocketTimeoutException
        Opens a URL Connection, and sets the URL Timeout, HTTP User-Agent and Referrer. If the userAgent is null then the system user agent is used. If the timeout is 0, then the system timeout is used.
        Parameters:
        url -
        Returns:
        URLConnection
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException
